title: Programming in your head
preview: Programming started out as just a job for me. I started enjoying it with time and still do. When I started out, I was like most programmers; Start hacking code and try to make it work. I copied pasted code from other files, Stack-overflow and the rest of the internet. I did not understand the programming language, the frameworks or the domain much. The focus was on ‘getting something to work’. Naturally, I was not a productive developer.

title: Hybrid Mobile App Development : Learning from experience
preview: Building mobile apps is not a side dish anymore, it has become a part of the main course for businesses. Hybrid mobile apps (Javascript + Native) tick more proverbial checkboxes than pure native apps as far as a sales pitch is concerned for non graphics/game apps.
